metadata.title: CVE-2021-38198 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
arch/x86/kvm/mmu/paging_tmpl.h in the Linux kernel before 5.12.11incorrectly computes the access permissions of a shadow page, leading to amissing guest protection page fault.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38198` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-222-generic - 4.4.0-222.255
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-222-generic - 4.4.0-222.255
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-222-lowlatency - 4.4.0-222.255
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
